products.name: Oatmilk Full Fat
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Plant-based foods, Dairies, Cereals and potatoes, Dairy substitutes, Cereals and their products, Milk substitutes, Plant-based beverages, Milks, Plant-based milk alternatives, Cereal-based drinks, Oat-based drinks
products.labels: Vegetarian, No gluten, No GMOs, Vegan, Non GMO project, Vegan Action
products.facts: ["Oatmilk Full Fat is primarily made from whole oats and water, providing a creamy texture and rich flavor.","Oats require less water to grow compared to almonds and dairy, making oatmilk a more sustainable option.","Oatmilk Full Fat is often fortified with vitamins and minerals such as calcium and vitamin D, enhancing its nutritional profile.","The production of oatmilk generates lower greenhouse gas emissions compared to traditional dairy milk, contributing to a smaller carbon footprint."]
